Dear ladies! Dear mothers and sisters!
I heartily congratulate you on International Women's Day and wish each of you good health, happiness and success.
The Azerbaijani woman has always been loyal to the spiritual nature of the woman and has always maintained the name of her name, the symbol of elegance, elegance and beauty.
Throughout history, he has written brilliant pages in his past with his wisdom, his business, and his purity.
There are unmatched services for women in all of the great successes gained by independent Azerbaijan.
Happy Holidays!

Suleiman Urges Greater Role for Women in Public Life http://t.co/S2N8WwXVue
Women should be able to play a wider role in public life & participate in broader aspects of national responsibilities, politics & administration
Governments should also pave way for women to gain their rights and benefit from the capabilities of the other half of society
Women are invited today to step into the fields of public affairs to assert their right to their role and existence outside their normal role as a mother
Women must have a greater role in public life and participate in broader areas of national responsibilities in politics and management as well as their social role.
Governments have to pave the way for women's access to their rights to benefit from the capabilities of half of society.
